item.title: How to Bypass the Invisible Malicious Ad Button
item.description: Disclaimer The Copyright Act of 1976 grants copyright holders “exclusive rights” to make copies of their work, distribute it and perform it publicly. And an individual user’s watching a stream — even if it’s unauthorized by the copyright holder — doesn’t technically violate these rights.1 Plus, I have Prime Video membership. I just don’t use it that often. Problem When I was rewatching (Shaun of the Dead)[https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0365748/] on some mysterious website, I tried to fast forward a little, the same thing I have done for a zillion times.
